summary: Contoso Wireless is a wireless service provider that offers high-speed internet access, voice and data plans, and other services with coverage in all 50 states. Prices range from $25 to $100 per month depending on the plan and the customer's needs. Contoso also offers additional services such as tech support, home security systems, device protection plans, and more. There is a 30-day free trial period available for all new customers and Contoso often runs special promotions throughout the year that can help save customers money.
